dhead: Heat capacity at constant pressure per unit mass<SUP>*</SUP>, J/K/kg

components.name: sodium trifluoromethanesulfonate
sample: crystallization from solution;dried by vacuum heating

title: Heat capacity and derived properties: Heat capacity at constant pressure per unit mass
footer: *property value is given as the difference (x - xref) from the reference state: pure solvent at system temperature and pressure

ref.full: Chen, T.; Hefter, G.; Buchner, R.; Senanayake, G. (1998) J. Solution Chem. 27(13), 1067-1096.
ref.title: Molar Volumes and Heat Capacities of Electrolytes and Ions in Nonaqueous Solvents: 1. Formamide
